arts.ttl: Flick talks Casado, De Jong, Lamine, Lewandowski, Fermin, Bardghji ahead of Levante vs Barcelona
arts.sum: FC Barcelona will be back in action this Saturday as they take on newly-promoted UD Levante on Matchday 2 of the 2025/26 La Liga season. Having begun the new campaign on a winning note with a 3-0 triumph against Mallorca, the reigning champions will be gunning for another victory on Saturday. arts.ttl: Barcelona push to register 23-year-old versatile star before Levante clash
arts.sum: According to Mundo Deportivo, Barcelona are moving with urgency to have Gerard Martin available for their upcoming league match against Levante. Although the club’s objective is to register all remaining players by August 30th, Martin is expected to be the first on that list. arts.ttl: Barcelona star expected to miss Levante clash
arts.sum: La Liga giants Barcelona look set to remain without the contributions of a member of the club’s summer recruitment drive this coming weekend. This comes amid confirmation that Roony Bardghji…
